thread.title: Trimax Corporation to Enter Cannabis Sector and Signs Letter of Intent to Acquire Leading Edge Ecommerce Business Recreational Dispensary

author: cnbc.com
title: Trimax Corporation to Enter Cannabis Sector and Signs Letter of Intent to Acquire Leading Edge Ecommerce Business Recreational Dispensary

organizations.name: trimax corporation to enter cannabis sector and signs letter of intent

text:
Recreational Dispensary to Add to Trimax Corporation’s Diversified Holdings
Chatsworth, CA, Feb. 06, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Trimax Corporation, Inc. (OTC PINK: TMXN) (the “Company”), a holding corporation, is pleased to announce its plans to diversify into the fast growing marijuana space by signing a Letter of Intent to acquire 100% of the assets of online business Omega Tech, Inc, operating under the name Recreational Dispensaries.
RecreationalDispensaries.com is an online portal that connects cannabis consumers with the highest rated dispensaries or storefronts, based on the user’s geographic location. They make the process of buying and delivering the product to your doorstep fast, secure and simple with just one click.
With Recreational Dispensary, consumers can shop online and choose from the very best inventory, from literally thousands of available dispensaries, and have their goods delivered to their front door. Consumers can order by phone or use Recreational Dispensary’s user friendly mobile platform which is designed to increase product sales, marketing, and profit margins for participating medicinal and recreational cannabis shops.
Consumers over 21 years of age, simply go to recreationaldispensaries.com , create an account, then order from their favorite shop.
Medicinal and recreational cannabis shops can login and create their own storefront profile, upload their product line images, prices and contact info. They will also have the ability to place banner ads to attract traffic to their digital storefront, it's just that easy.
The overall goal is to increase new clients for retailers, increase sales, and offer end consumers quality products and services, which results in customer retention, convenience and long-lasting relationships.
Website Overview:
Product locator:
Based on the user’s geographic location or search criteria including; Strains, Effects, Medical Uses & Flavors. RecreationalDispensaries.com provides cannabis consumers a search engine tool to locate a specific cannabis strain, concentrate, edibles, or topical products.
Dispensary Locator:
Based on the user’s geographic location or search criteria, RecreationalDispensaries.com searches for dispensaries, storefronts, delivery services, and access points.
Forum:
Cannabis consumers whether medicinal or recreational will soon be able to connect with other consumers to freely discuss and review strains, products, dispensaries, medical doctors, or simply share a sophisticated dialog about ideal cannabis choices.
Rating:
RecreationalDispensaries.com uses an automated software to suggest the most reliable reviews for the online cannabis consumer community, made by the consumers themselves, throughout the states and cities where permitted by law. The software looks at various signals, including activity on RecreationalDispensaries.com , level of both customer service and product quality, as well as reliability. This system has nothing to do with whether a dispensary advertises on RecreationalDispensaries.com or not.
RecreationalDispensaries.com feature ratings and reviews for consumers of strains, products, storefronts and dispensary locations, to assist others in making the most informed selection for their needs.
Advertising:
RecreationalDispensaries.com offers strategic digital advertising sponsorship opportunities to dispensaries and medical marijuana shops, cannabis products, delivery services, or clinics looking to promote their services in the industry.
Product Delivery: In final BETA format and coming soon!
Mobile App: In final BETA Apple iOS and Android versions and coming soon!
Special Discounts or coupons offered to members from a dispensary near you: Coming soon!
Check out Recreational Dispensary’s FAQ page for more website information:
www.recreationaldispensary.com
www.recreationaldispensaries.com
Hugo Saavedra, CEO of Trimax Corporation and Saavy Naturals Inc., stated, “We are strong believers that diversification is the key to success and are extremely pleased to announce our intent to diversify into the fast-growing marijuana sector with an ecommerce company that brings a leading edge mobile technological platform to the forefront of this billion dollar industry.” He also stated, “This acquisition will allow for Trimax to benefit from two wholly-owned subsidiaries that will bring multiple revenue streams into the company.”
The state of Vermont just recently passed legislation for recreational sales and was the latest addition to the already existing 30 states, nine of which allow for recreational sales, that are now allowing for the sale of medicinal and/or recreational marijuana.
Recreational Dispensaries.com is in the process of launching in the state of California but expects to expand into every state across the U.S. that offers medicinal and recreational cannabis sales, over the next several months.
Both parties have already exchanged documents in order to complete a thorough due diligence process and expect to enter into a Definitive Agreement in order to complete the acquisition within the next 10 business days.
Hugo and Debra Saavedra, Saavy Naturals Inc.’s, CEO and President, gained instant popularity for their all-natural body care product line after being spotlighted and appearing on ABC’s hit show Shark Tank. The Sharks took an instant liking to Hugo and Debra, their love story, their previous success in the body care industry, and the superior quality of their all-natural product. Hugo and Debra have increased the company’s product line exposure with several highlighted television features on The Home Shopping Network and are currently working on additional television marketing opportunities.
Saavy Naturals Inc. on Shark Tank:
https://vimeo.com/231634993

About Trimax Corporation:
Trimax Corporation, is a holding company, and through its wholly owned subsidiary, Saavy Naturals Inc., offers a complete line of Natural Skin Care products, which includes body creams, body scrubs, body wash, shampoos, conditioners, handcrafted soaps, bath bombs, bath salts and candles. Saavy Naturals products are 100% natural, vegan, gluten-free, soy free, cruelty-free, non-GMO, and food-grade. Currently, Saavy Naturals can be found in some of the largest natural retail stores and exclusive boutiques and spas across the nation. Some of the retailers include Whole Foods Market in the Northeast and Southern California regions, Gelson's Market, Vitamin Cottage, Bristol Farms, Erewhon, Lazy Acres and Earth Fare. Additionally, Saavy Naturals products can be purchased through numerous online retailers, including http://www.Amazon.com , and http://www.Saavynaturals.com .
For more information please visit our website:
http://www.saavynaturals.com
